response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a unique product that holds immense value to me. This item is not just a possession but a symbol of excellence and craftsmanship. I believe its true worth surpasses $1,000,000, and I am extending this exclusive offer to you at a special price of $950,000. This is a once-in-a-lifetime chance to own something truly exceptional. I look forward to discussing the details with you and welcoming you as a distinguished owner of this masterpiece.", "product_price": 950000}
